mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id as articleId, a.article_title as articleTitle, a.article_content as articleContent, a.view_cnt as viewCnt, a.user_id as userId, a.video_url as videoUrl, a.created_at as createdAt, a.modified_at as modifiedAt, a.media_name as mediaName, a.category, u.user_name as userName FROM article a, user u WHERE a.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (article_title, article_content, user_id, video_url, created_at, media_name, category) VALUES (#{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{userId}, #{videoUrl}, now(), #{mediaName}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id as articleId, a.article_title as articleTitle, a.article_content as articleContent, a.view_cnt as viewCnt, a.user_id as userId, a.video_url as videoUrl, a.created_at as createdAt, a.modified_at as modifiedAt, a.media_name as mediaName, a.category, u.user_name as userName FROM article a, user u WHERE a.article_id = #{articleId} AND a.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET article_title = #{articleTitle}, article_content = #{articleContent}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, modified_at = now(), media_name = #{mediaName}, category = #{category} WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
